Pay attention nowâ€”this isn't an operation for keeners. I've found an arena in Sand Wind Village where the kulkari force prisoners, slaves, and even other kulkari to fight monsters.

The worst is called {@LinkCreature:24#5001#Merkaratos}. We're going to kill it and deprive the buggers of their bloody fun. And by "we," I mean you and whoever you can convince to come along. Much as I want to join in the fun, I have another scouting mission to attend to.
Do you want your fellow soldiers captured and forced to fight to the death? Go kill Merkaratos.
I don't know how they caught it, but as long as it has victims to hunt, {@LinkCreature:24#5001#Merkaratos} isn't going anywhere.
